authors: Hannah Paine For Daily Mail Australia
description: The girlfriend of Jobe Watson model Virginia Slaghekke cut a fashionable figure while going solo at a Lavazza VAMFF event on Thursday night.
title: Jobe Watson's model girlfriend Virginia Slaghekke at VAMFF
title_page: Jobe Watson's model girlfriend Virginia Slaghekke at VAMFF | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's the glamourous other half of controversial Essendon player Jobe Watson, 32.
And 26-year-old model Virginia Slaghekke cut a fashionable figure while going solo at a Lavazza VAMFF event on Thursday night.
The Dutch-born beauty, who is currently on university exchange in Melbourne for six months, stunned in a striking red mini dress at the fashion gala.
Scroll down for video
Red hot! Jobe Watson's glamorous model girlfriend Virginia Slaghekke cuts a fashionable figure at VAMFF
Virginia wore a form-fitting crimson dress which featured an elaborate bow tied around her hips and showcased her slim figure.
The aspiring doctor accessorised with a matching YSL handbag and strappy silver stilettos.
Sporting a severe middle part, the New York-based model wore her brunette locks slicked back in a sleek low ponytail.
Perfect match: The aspiring doctor accessorised with a matching YSL handbag
Stylish: Virginia wore a form-fitting crimson dress which featured an elaborate bow tied around her hips and showcased her slim figure
Virginia kept her makeup simple, pairing a strong eyebrow with a slick of bright red lipstick.
Inside the event, Virginia could be seen sipping from a cup of espresso coffee and later sat front row in a fashion show.
The brunette beauty met Jobe in New York late last year, where the AFL player was living after being slapped with a two year playing suspension over the Essendon Football Club's supplements scandal.
Needed a caffeine hit? Inside the event, Virginia could be seen sipping from a cup of espresso coffee
Classic: Virginia kept her makeup simple, pairing a strong eyebrow with a slick of bright red lipstick
Standing out: The brunette model was hard to miss when she later sat front row at a fashion show
She told the Herald Sun last month that she had no idea who the famous footballer was when he ran after her with his number on a napkin after spotting her in a cafe.
'I did not know of the existence of AFL until a few months ago,' she said. 'The way I know Jobe is from New York and there he is just Jobe. He is just Jobe to me.'
Despite having worked successfully as a model for Italian Vogue and Cartier, Virginia is currently completing a university neuroscience degree with plans to study medicine afterwards.
Love match: The brunette beauty met Jobe in New York where the AFL player was living after being slapped with a two year playing suspension over the Essendon Football Club's supplements scandal
